
```{r interface_flow_table, include=TRUE}

interface.flows = tryCatch( interface_flows(), error=function(cond) {return('ERROR: interface_flows query not returning correct results.')})

if ( typeof(interface.flows)=='character' ) {
  knitr::kable(interface.flows)
} else {

annual.flows = interface.flows %>% 
  filter(Type=='Annual_Flow') %>%
  select(name, value)
colnames(annual.flows)[2] = 'GWh'
knitr::kable(annual.flows, digits=3)

}
```
